summary:
Specialties: marketing, strategy, marketing communications, analytics, data driven, automation, digital marketing.

"Jasper’s genius lies in his ability to marry the technical with the creative. A truly strategic thinker, he helps businesses get to the heart of what they truly need to do to achieve their goals - asking the right questions and putting himself in the shoes of the customer. Agency-side with a number of web and marketing businesses, he has worked on projects that required complex programming as well as creative thinking and designing. He practices agile project delivery and believes wholeheartedly in the power of collaboration for driving better solutions - which is why we are here!"

education.field_of_study: Digital Marketing Certificate, Squared Online - a Google / HLC Partnership

school.name: Hanzehogeschool Groningen / Hanze University of Applied Sciences Groningen

projects.title: Website Het Zon Effect
projects.description: Website ter ondersteuning van de campagne Het Zon Effect van ZMf en Zeeuwind.

projects.title: Het zeeuwselandschap
projects.description: Eén van de doelstellingen van Het Zeeuwse Landschap voor deze website is het faciliteren van bezoek aan de natuurgebieden die de organisatie beheert. Hierbij is informatie over de ligging, toegankelijkheid en bijvoorbeeld parkeermogelijkheden per gebied voor potentiële bezoekers van belang. Doordat we geografische informatie over de gebieden hebben geïmporteerd vanuit de eigen systemen (GIS) van Het Zeeuwse Landschap kunnen we geïnteresseerden niet alleen de ligging van een gebied tonen, maar zelfs de contouren presenteren op een Google Maps kaart.

projects.title: OVERNL Magazine
projects.description: Nieuw landelijke magazine: Nederland vanuit de Lucht

projects.title: ANBO Corporate Website
projects.description: Realisatie van de nieuwe corporate website van ANBO (Woerden), de grootste belangenorganisatie voor ouderen in Nederland.

contributors.headline: Founder l Stakeholder Engagement & Technology Marketing Expert at ZOMER

projects.title: Website Oikos
projects.description: Website in de nieuwe huisstijl van Oikos met uitstekende mogelijkheden voor het presenteren van projecten en publicaties van Oikos.

projects.title: Ecomare - Website
projects.description: Website die te zien was bij Ecomare in een Zuil met Touchscreen.

projects.title: Iriz thuiszorg
projects.description: Iriz thuiszorg is een nieuw merk in ‘het thuiszorg-landschap’ in Zeeland. Voorheen heette de organisatie ABTZ Zeeland. De aanleiding om aan een traject van rebranding te beginnen was dat de (ongeschreven) missie, visie en kernwaarden die in het bedrijf al aanwezig waren, niet in het merk weerklonken. En wat er verteld werd was niet prikkelend en onderscheidend genoeg. De organisatie was op zoek naar een nieuwe, en vooral onderscheidende manier om zich te profileren.

projects.title: Ontwikkeling website Fietsen Scoort
projects.description: Volledig herbouwen en verbeteren van de website van Fietsen Scoort: een website waarop deelnemers aan het project hun fietskilometers kunnen registreren met als doe CO2-besparing te bevorderen. Door middel van sponsoring van deelnemende werkgevers worden projecten ondersteund.

contributors.headline: Lead-engineer ICT/GEO at Provincie Zeeland / Co-owner at Maritimephoto.com

projects.title: IP Top Awards
projects.description: The IP Top Awards are the annual elections for the best interactive content sites in Europe. Publications from all over Europe can enter the awards to compete with their opponents. Previous winners include: Guardian Unlimited, DM Online, Sport1, Manchester Airport, The Irish Times, Zoomit, SwissGuide and Novo Nordisk, BBC News Online, ZDF.Reporter.

contributors.headline: Marketing, Strategy & Product Development at Catchup! Communications AG
Amsterdam-based curator and moderator of events on media, tech, and innovation. Nextconf, CrossMediaCafe, Immersive Tech Week, Tweakers, Dataxis, New World Same Humans, Emerce Eday, etc.

profile_positions.description:
- Develop and lead the marketing department of XY Marketing Solutions.
- Help develop the business strategy and improve the market position of XY Marketing Solutions as a digital marketing agency.
- Educate current and future digital marketeers employed with XY Marketing Solutions as well as assist them while executing their day-to-day job.
profile_positions.title: Senior Marketing Consultant

profile_positions.description: Cultural and language differences make many companies struggle to be successful outside of their home market. Lean Marketing Services helps these companies by offering native language digital marketing services. The different cultural backgrounds, environments and languages of our people offer our clients the alternative perspective they need to be successful in this multicultural landscape. This goes beyond translating marketing campaigns to a different language and includes cultural sensitivities, timely regional market adjustments and subtle language interpretations.
profile_positions.title: Owner

profile_positions.description:
- Strategic consultancy for online projects
- Manage operational online marketing
- Consultancy role on projects for SMEs and larger corporations as ANBO, Sanoma International, Tearfund, CZAV and Bergfood.
profile_positions.title: Marketeer & Strategist

profile_positions.description: As of January '14 I have been responsible for the online department of the Nilsson agency. Furthermore I did consultancy projects on the use of strategic communications (online & offline) and applying different communication tools and media for different objectives. Within the agency I'm the specialist for interactive media and more specific technical (internet) applications. I'm the connector between the clients needs, technical opportunities and the needs of the end customer for B2B as well as B2C.
profile_positions.title: Manager Online / Senior Advisor

profile_positions.description: In addition to my job at Rabobank I stayed closely connected to the Nilsson agency as an Online Consultant, mainly focused on technical and strategically complex projects.
profile_positions.title: Online Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Full service communications agency.

Responsible for sales & consultancy for larger projects and clients. Projects vary from governmental communications to marketing communications for commercial companies.
profile_positions.title: Account Manager / Communications Consultant

profile_positions.description:
We are a collective of online marketing experts who first met whilst carrying out a digital marketing leadership course by Google. Following six months of getting to know one another online, and unearthing a shared passion for digital innovation, we came to realise that by pooling our skills we could create something special to benefit businesses seeking digital expertise.

We hail from across the globe and have varied skillsets and industry experience covering the end-to-end digital marketing mix, meaning that we can provide a holistic service to our clients accompanied by first-hand knowledge of a range of local and international markets.

We strongly believe in the power of (virtual) collaboration and have experienced putting it into practice with our own team.
profile_positions.title: Co-founder & Core Team Member

company.name: Squared Online - a Google / HLC Partnership

profile_positions.description: My job a Rabobank was split between Marketing Intelligence and regular hands-on tasks for the MCC team. The main question I had to answer is "how can we create useful analyses from the, sometimes incoherent data sources we have available in order to serve our clients better (and increase sales :-) )".
profile_positions.title: Market Development Manager / Data Specialist
